definitions: use (a machine) as a source of spare parts for another, similar machine

examples.text: cannibalizing two broken-down cars might provide spare parts to make one working car
high culture should cannibalize mass culture

definitions: (of a company) reduce the sales of (one of its own products) as a consequence of introducing another similar product

examples.text: the suppliers did not want to cannibalize high-margin business with low-margin sales

shortDefinitions: reduce sales of product as result of introducing similar product

definitions: (of an animal) eat (a member of the same species)
